      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030117</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030117</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Biomoléculas</string>
            <string language="en">Biomolecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biomoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biomolécules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biomolecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biomolecole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βιομόρια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explica qué son y cómo se agrupan los bioelementos, qué son las biomoléculas. Además, explica la estructura del agua y sales minerales y su importancia biológica.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining what bioelements are and how they are grouped, and what biomolecules are. There is also an explanation of the structure of water and mineral salts and their biological importance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Biomoléculas</string>
            <string language="en">Biomolecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Themaerklären was bioelements sind und wie sie 
gruppiert werden und welche Biomoleküle sind. Es gibt auch eine
Erklärung der Struktur des Wassers und der Mineralsalze und ihres 
biologischen Wertes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquer de sujet ce qui sont les bioelements et
comment ils sont groupés, et quels biomolécules sont. Il y a 
également une explication de la structure de l'eau et les sels 
minéraux et leur importance biologique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicação do tópico o que os bioelements são
e como são agrupados, e que biomolecules são. Há também uma 
explanação da estrutura da água e sais minerais e sua importância 
biológica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione di soggetto che cosa i bioelements 
sono e come sono raggruppati e che biomolecole sono. Ci è 
egualmente una spiegazione della struttura di acqua e sali minerali e 
la loro importanza biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί ποια bioelements είναι και πώς 
ομαδοποιούνται, και ποια βιομόρια είναι. Υπάρχει επίσης μια
εξήγηση της δομής του ύδατος και των ορυκτών αλάτων και 
βιολογικής σπουδαιότητάς τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biomoleküle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biomolécules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biomolecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biomolecole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
